languages.text: {n}Даже поднеся руку к кристаллу, вы ощущаете исходящую от него волну психической энергии. Когда ваши пальцы касаются ледяной поверхности, ваш разум наполняется водоворотом чужих страстей — ненавистью, жаждой крови, ужасом, отчаянием...{/n}

{n}Just bringing your hand near the crystal is enough for you to feel the wave of psychic energy emanating from it. When your fingers brush the icy surface, the maelstrom of another's emotions bursts into your mind — hatred, bloodlust, terror, despair...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Даже поднеся руку к кристаллу, вы ощущаете исходящую от него волну психической энергии. Когда ваши пальцы касаются ледяной поверхности, ваш разум наполняется водоворотом чужих страстей — ненавистью, жаждой крови, ужасом, отчаянием...{/n}

{n}Just bringing your hand near the crystal is enough for you to feel the wave of psychic energy emanating from it. When your fingers brush the icy surface, the maelstrom of another's emotions bursts into your mind — hatred, bloodlust, terror, despair...{/n}

languages.text: {n}你刚刚把手伸向水晶时，就感受到了它散发的灵能波动。当你用手指轻触它冰冷的表面时，你感觉到另一个人情绪的漩涡在你的脑海中迸发——仇恨、嗜血、恐怖、绝望......{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Just bringing your hand near the crystal is enough for you to feel the wave of psychic energy emanating from it. When your fingers brush the icy surface, the maelstrom of another's emotions bursts into your mind — hatred, bloodlust, terror, despair...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你刚刚把手伸向水晶时，就感受到了它散发的灵能波动。当你用手指轻触它冰冷的表面时，你感觉到另一个人情绪的漩涡在你的脑海中迸发——仇恨、嗜血、恐怖、绝望......{/n}

languages.text: {n}クリスタルに手を近づけるだけで、放たれる霊的エネルギーの波を感じとれる。指がツルツルの表面を撫でると、憎悪、血への渇望、恐怖、絶望など、自分のモノではない感情の〈渦〉（メイルシュトローム）が心の中に流れ込んできた…{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Just bringing your hand near the crystal is enough for you to feel the wave of psychic energy emanating from it. When your fingers brush the icy surface, the maelstrom of another's emotions bursts into your mind — hatred, bloodlust, terror, despair...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}クリスタルに手を近づけるだけで、放たれる霊的エネルギーの波を感じとれる。指がツルツルの表面を撫でると、憎悪、血への渇望、恐怖、絶望など、自分のモノではない感情の〈渦〉（メイルシュトローム）が心の中に流れ込んできた…{/n}

languages.text: {n}Solo acercar la mano al cristal basta para que sientas una onda de energía psíquica que emana del interior. Cuando tus dedos rozan la superficie helada, un torbellino de emociones ajenas irrumpe en tu mente: odio, sed de sangre, terror, desesperación...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Just bringing your hand near the crystal is enough for you to feel the wave of psychic energy emanating from it. When your fingers brush the icy surface, the maelstrom of another's emotions bursts into your mind — hatred, bloodlust, terror, despair...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Solo acercar la mano al cristal basta para que sientas una onda de energía psíquica que emana del interior. Cuando tus dedos rozan la superficie helada, un torbellino de emociones ajenas irrumpe en tu mente: odio, sed de sangre, terror, desesperación...{/n}

languages.text: {n}Il vous suffit d'approcher votre main du cristal pour sentir les ondes d'énergie psychique qui s'en dégagent. À peine vos doigts sont-ils entrés en contact avec sa surface glaciale qu'un maelstrom de sensations étrangères vous submerge : haine, fureur sanguinaire, terreur, désespoir...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Just bringing your hand near the crystal is enough for you to feel the wave of psychic energy emanating from it. When your fingers brush the icy surface, the maelstrom of another's emotions bursts into your mind — hatred, bloodlust, terror, despair...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Il vous suffit d'approcher votre main du cristal pour sentir les ondes d'énergie psychique qui s'en dégagent. À peine vos doigts sont-ils entrés en contact avec sa surface glaciale qu'un maelstrom de sensations étrangères vous submerge : haine, fureur sanguinaire, terreur, désespoir...{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du näherst dich mit deiner Hand dem Kristall und spürst direkt, wie eine Welle psionischer Energie von ihm ausgeht. Als du mit deinen Fingern die eisige Oberfläche berührst, strömt ein Mahlstrom der Emotionen einer anderen Person in deinen Geist – Hass, Blutrausch, Schrecken, Verzweiflung ...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Just bringing your hand near the crystal is enough for you to feel the wave of psychic energy emanating from it. When your fingers brush the icy surface, the maelstrom of another's emotions bursts into your mind — hatred, bloodlust, terror, despair...{/n}

languages.text: {n}Elini kristale yaklaştırman bile ondan yayılan ruhsezi enerji dalgasını hissetmene yetiyor. Parmaklarının buz gibi yüzeye dokunmasıyla birlikte zihnin, başka birine ait duyguların girdabına kapılıyor. Öfke, kana susamışlık, dehşet, keder...{/n}
